hero.title: Digitally German. Globally Smart. Human-Centered.
hero.subtitle: Your Solution Partner from Dubai to Europe
hero.description: Professional German Translation, Immigration Support, and AI-Powered Solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Connecting Cultures, Transforming Futures
about.description: Founded by German entrepreneurial excellence and based in the heart of Dubai, we bridge three worlds: the innovation of Europe, the ambition of the Middle East, and the precision of German engineering.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Explore Our Core Services
services.description: From smart translation to AI-powered automation and full migration support we're here to make things simple, fast, and human.

translation.title: Translation
translation.description: Culturally relevant translation between Arabic, English, and German.

migration.title: Migration Support
migration.description: Visa guidance, document translation, and full support to help you move to Germany smoothly.

ai.title: AI Agent Development
ai.description: We build custom AI assistants that help businesses automate support, sales, and data.

german.title: German Language Coaching
german.description: Beginner-friendly German lessons, tailored for migrants.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Real stories from people we've helped — in migration, translation, and tech.

items.name: Ahmed S.
items.text: Your team helped me move to Germany without stress. Everything was smooth and professional. Thank you!

items.name: Lisa M.
items.text: The AI agent you built saved us hours every day. Highly efficient and easy to use!

items.name: Khalid R.
items.text: We needed urgent certified translations — got them fast and spot on. Excellent service!

footer.subscribeDesc: Get the latest insights on AI, digital transformation, and German migration opportunities.
footer.brandDesc: Bridging Dubai, the Middle East, and Europe with next-generation digital, AI, and language transformation solutions. Founded by German excellence, powered by innovation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.intro: To be the digital bridge that connects businesses, individuals, and institutions across Dubai, the Middle East, and Europe through innovative AI solutions, precise legal translations, and comprehensive migration support.

human.title: Human-Centered
human.desc: Every solution starts with understanding human needs and cultural nuances.

precision.title: German Precision
precision.desc: Meticulous attention to detail and quality in everything we deliver.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.desc: Leveraging cutting-edge AI and technology to solve complex challenges.
